data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Jajapur, Odisha, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jajapur, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Jajapur, Odisha, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 148 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Jajapur, Odisha, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Jajapur do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Jajapur, Odisha, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Shari people.
Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Jajapur that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Jajapur, Odisha, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Jajapur, Odisha, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
